name: My Deflection
description:
you are a young traveller looking for a old valueable treasure in a weird temple.

As far as the myths go they say the treasure is so powerfull it makes you inavetable, but look out because it's dangerous out there!

I made this game together with MrMaxico

P.S: this is a beta version where the basic features are already in, it will be updated soon! We just didn't have enough time because we started too late ;(

this game is for the weekly game jam: theme 148 - mirror.
